message: Has anyone come across a plugin which can add a feature in Apple Mail to turn emails into task or follow ups? Wrike.com used to have one, but no longer available, and then there is this http://www.mailpilot.co but I don't want to change to a whole new mail app.. I just want to tag or flag and add a follow up to an email :(
story: Marek Jan shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Mail Pilot | Intuitive email for Mac, iPhone + iPad
caption: mailpilot.co
description: Quickly manage and productively organize your Inbox with Mail Pilot for Mac, iPhone + iPad | Intuitive email with a simple, task-oriented approach.
